price: Dijeron: "Demóralos a él y a su hermano, y envía emisarios por las ciudades
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبۡعَثۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-ib'ʿath fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
